output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF/AEP Code: Yes, contains "COD AEP: 11240002" 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Nicolae Ciucă" as presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, paid Facebook/Instagram ad with 15,000-19,999 impressions 4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly promotes Nicolae Ciucă as "viitorul președinte al României" 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content 6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication from PNL Vâlcea
This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Uses campaign messaging and calls for votes - Contains electoral code - Is a paid advertisement - Directly asks for votes for the November 24 election - Published after the end of the legal campaign period

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: 1. Direct promotion of presidential candidate Nicolae Ciucă 2. Contains explicit electoral messaging 3. Paid distribution on social media 4. Calls for electoral action ("Pe 24 noiembrie avem șansa de a alege") 5. Contains official campaign identifier (AEP code)
conclusion.message-for-police: PNL Vâlcea, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 486201574473068) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie. Postarea, publicata ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, promoveaza explicit candidatul Nicolae Ciucă pentru functia de presedinte, solicitand in mod direct votul cetatenilor pentru data de 24 noiembrie, continand si cod AEP (11240002). Mesajul a fost difuzat dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind incetarea campaniei electorale.
